website_summaries.verdict: The original BOSU balance trainer is great for balance exercises.
pros: A great half-ball for a variety of balance exercises and workouts
This ball includes a workout DVD and a poster featuring 16 exercises
Measures 65 cm in diameter and comes in 5 color options
cons: Some customers reported leaks in their balance trainers

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS AIR EVERY 2-3 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Bosu for about 4 weeks now. Is there a problem with my Bosu, or does everyone have to refill their flat Bosu every couple days? UPDATED TO ⭐⭐⭐⭐ I emailed the manufacturer directly, supplied them the receipt invoice from Amazon as well as the serial number on the ball, and they are shipping me a replacement. It's nice to know there are still manufacturers out there that stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I loved it until I came home today, July 27, 2017 and found my BOSU completely detached from its frame. It was still inflated but had completely fallen off the base. What???!!! I could have severely injured myself not knowing that this BOSU was about to break. I guess they're not built for durability or longevity. It's not what I thought when I purchased it. I have not even had it for a year. So disappointed. I have seen these BOSU's at the gym being abused and all. I take good care of my things. I don't understand :(
customer_reviews.author: Vanda

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: No pump, no plug, no dvds, no documents included. All I received was the deflated BOSU ball. No inflation pump, and when I found a pump and spent a good while with a hand pump, I realized there was no plug to prevent instant deflation of BOSU ball.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: broke within 6 months, not sure what the deal is here, but it broke
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Got a Bad One
customer_reviews.text: Never held air. My wife pumped it up a couple of times after Christmas, but it was flat the next day. I finally tried it myself as it's been sitting new in the corner of the workout room and got the same result. Too bad I didn't act within the 30 return period. Out a $100 smackers. Not sure if there's any recourse as I'm an Amazon return novice. Seems like a good product, but I guess you're taking a chance as you could end up like I did. Perhaps I fell on the sword for the group and got the defective one out of the way and you'll be good for a while! Happy working-out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miss all but trainer and pump.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the comments. I did not receive the DVD, chart, plug, diet guide or 120 page training guide. Yes I double and triple checked the box and packing material. I received a box with the trainer and a pump both in plastic bags. I have not had a chance to try pumping it up or using it since I have no plug and directions. Very disappointing. Now I must roll the dice and see if I can get the missing items or do I need to return it and hope for a better quality check on the next one I get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience and will buy at brick and mortar
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated as unit came with no pump, no air plug and none of the CD accessories. Not a good experience and will buy at brick and mortar store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pump, Missing DVD's, Missing plug, Missing chart.  Sloppy work.
customer_reviews.text: So sloppy. My package was missing the pump, missing the wall chart, missing the DVD's, and missing the air plug.
customer_reviews.author: Anjo

customer_reviews.title: do NOT BUY- does not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: does snot stay inflated. I've tried everything to keep it inflated but it just doesn't. I have to inflate it after every use and have tried to contact the company which the phone number listed on Amazon for product support is no longer in service and the website is compromised and threatens to attack your system and steal personal information. Very frustrating and extreme waste of $100, I wish I could return it but cannot get any support.
customer_reviews.author: K Curtis

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bosu!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bosu. I use it rubber side down for balance exercises. It does require a Bosu tool to remove the air plug, which is sold separately and only by Bosu. You'd think for a hundred bucks that they'd throw in the tool. I paid $7.95 for the tool. The included DVDs are really cheesy, so cheesy that they're funny.
customer_reviews.author: Nikwax

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bosu came defective the air valve doesn't have a stop to keep air in
customer_reviews.author: Maiay

customer_reviews.title: Bosu Leak
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed because I had been looking forward to having a bosu ball for years. The video looks great, and I couldn't wait to work out. But after we inflated the ball, we could hear a leak on the seam. We tried to inflate it two times, but each time the bosu ball would go flat in less than a minute. I don't know if I got a defective product or if they are all are being so massed produced that they aren't being made well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Hope Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I used it to help come back from multiple back surgeries. My balance was severely messed up. I went from super easy leg steps in the beginning to advanced one-foot balance exercises w/moving arms and looking in different directions. Complex level stuff. I'm now far better than I was before. Mine came w/ an inflator and exercise book and CD. Heavy duty unit, well made, not so easy to store. Very stable. I still use it for core work. Really challenges one's balance no matter how healthy you think you are.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: This is the "Home Version" Model
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product because it's their "Home Version" model, which differs from the ones that I'm used to at the gym. The size seems about right but the underside has six plastic feet and no anti-skid surface. The problem then becomes that it doesn't perform well in the "upside-down" position and actually becomes more dangerous in my opinion. I'm going to find a commercial version though because it really is a great product, thus my 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not the same quality as you'd find in the gym
customer_reviews.text: First, I didn't realize different colors were different prices (pay attention to that - you can save up to $35 by picking a different color!) Then after I pumped it up, there was a noticeable dent in the rubber part that hasn't gone away. When I use it, it makes noises like the air is coming out but I'm pretty sure it's just separating from the sides. That has never happened with one at the gym. Lastly, on the bottom, it's not flat. The little screw looking areas pop out and aren't flush with the bottom. If I had to do it again, I'd purchase the pro version for $15 more dollars and avoided this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: it's heavier than expect
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say I love this item because I hate doing squats. HA! I do like that its very well made and it appears that it's going to hold up really well. I use it mostly for doing squats and working on my balance. It is pretty heavy. The nice part is it comes with the pump so you can make the ball side as firm as you want.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check the complete box to read everything too. It is a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing a Bosu Balance Trainer and first impressions: quality is amazing. The material is super thick and it is a heavy dome. Inflating it is easy, but make sure to keep the measurements according to the manual. I deflated it a bit because I went overboard, super easy to do. It takes 5 minutes tops to get it ready to go. It comes with a manual, warranty, a bunch of numbers and emails to contact support if anything were to happen. I will make sure to warm up to it and start slow. It arrived on time too.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.C

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Inflated quickly with the included hand pump. Just make sure you follow directions- to include placing it on the floor. I was initially trying to do it with it flat on my sofa and it would not work. Moved to the floor and within minutes I had it inflated. This is a surprisingly versatile piece of equipment and with the included workout poster and DVD I've been able to use it in a variety of ways.
customer_reviews.author: Xenli

customer_reviews.title: Buy the original, not a knock off. Quality and will last
customer_reviews.text: The original Bosu ball is expensive but if you want to really use this tool often for a variety of exercises, it’s worth it to invest in the original “real” version. You can do so many different types of exercises at home that I learned through my F45 class. You can jump on this to get your heart rate up, do squats, crunches, burpees, mountain climbers, push ups, etc. The list goes on. Highly recommend. Was easy to inflate and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bosu Balance Trainer!
customer_reviews.text: This “half ball” is so much fun—I love it! It was relatively simple to inflate with the enclosed pump; just follow the directions. I enjoy standing on it to balance (love the “bounce” effect). Just stepping onto it and off with one leg then the other really gives my legs a workout! Haven’t even checked out all the exercises on the enclosed sheet. And when turned upside down (flat black surface up) I sit on it to balance and kick with my legs—also lots of fun. It’s my favorite exercise equipment, after my Mini-Trampoline. I highly recommend this Bosu Balance Trainer, 65cm.
customer_reviews.author: BAR112

customer_reviews.title: Red is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this red Bosu ball. It is in front of my 2 laptop computers and I stand on it while working on my elevated computers. It is a bit pricey, but I do love the beautiful red color. So glad someone started making this in wonderful colors. I previously had the blue Bosu ball but it bit the dust when my shoes put a hole it in. I now stand on my bare feet. Great exercise for legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joann L

customer_reviews.title: a great piece of equiptment
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about Bosu for a while.. I used it at the gym here and there, but no one wanted to invest time in showing clients the benefits - so I found education online and now I'm addicted :) This is an amazing tool , and with the right direction, some good foundation moves and workouts - it's a part of my every day now! I love it for core especially - helps with back and neck issues - plus there are LOTS of core moves to do on it too! When you flip it over for stability, it's great too ! It's super easy to inflate and a great staple in my work out routine!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to the BOSU in physical therapy after a broken ankle. I found it VERY difficult at that time. But recently I was reintroduced to the BOSU and there are so many uses. As I age I do feel a decrease in balance and this should help! There are so many exercises you can do with the BOSU...and the name means "both sides up" which makes perfect sense. I think we will lean to be good friends!
customer_reviews.author: Hollyberry

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to home gym, money well spent for in home physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for in home physical therapy, along with a 10 lb medicine ball. This Bosu ball came with the DVD's and wall charts of exercises to do. Nice extra to have. Instructions said to pump it up so height of ball was X amount, but couldn't get it that height. It works great for a 205 lb man to do his in home physical therapy, and all the exercises shown on the charts. Have not to add air yet in the 1 month that I've owned it.
customer_reviews.author: ScotZ71

customer_reviews.title: Wild Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We call this Bosu Pinkie Pie and it is fun for sure! We leave ours under inflated to feel like walking in sand for a great leg workout. You need to hold on to something for balance at the first few weeks until you get better at it. We have a treadmill so we put it next to that and hold on to the treadmill bar for our Bosu work out. They sell a Bosu Stand with a generous grip bar on it that is perfect for Plus size gals or Seniors or anyone really. Special kids love this too but use a grip bar as it is wild fun! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite pieces of exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. It is a versatile tool for all kinds of body weight exercises and exercises with weights. I would definitely by this again. It seems to be well made. I use it with or without exercise tubing with handles. I like the extra stability challenge the Bosu provides to my workout. My young adult sons and grandkids like to play on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Victorystarr

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it to work out on, my son bounces on it like he is on speed. Wife gets a work out, son expels a quarter of his energy...must be ok. Had to add more air after about 10 months, but that's not too bad considering its use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: My gym is closed because of the virus. I need your own BOSU.
customer_reviews.text: I am already familiar with the BOSU because it is one of my go-to pieces of equipment at the gym. Now my gym is closed because of the virus and I am isolated at home like everyone else. I decided that I will keep up with my exercise during this "temporary isolation" that can last for months. I bought my own BOSU. Now I follow the program I downloaded on my phone and I don't miss going to the gym as much. The BOSU is a good investment in myself and my health.
customer_reviews.author: I. Lau

customer_reviews.title: The Original; Super Solid - And Made in USA...!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review because the product is way solid, complete - and made in USA. But also because a 'good' review will double my warranty - and that's more smart business from the BOSU people. It's solid, heavy and the rubber is high quality and supple; there is no way knock-offs can compete and their site support is remarkable; so many exercises...! My only suggest is that in their 'get wall chart/stuff' free promotion, they permit user to download and/or receive by email assets so as not to incur shipping charges; a downloadable wall chart should be a given from such a smart company... Otherwise - awesome...!
customer_reviews.author: waves2ya

customer_reviews.title: Bosu is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the hot pink Bosu Balance Trainer, 65cm. It arrived lightning quick with Amazon Prime One-Day shipping and it was in perfect condition. It's super sturdy and a little heavy. I use it 5-days out of the week and find it very beneficial in strengthening my core and to improve my balance. I do not know the quality of other brands, but after thorough research, I did not want to take a chance on other brands, just because they were lower in price. I think the Bosu Balance Trainer is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: TofuYumYum

customer_reviews.title: Not a good design if using both sides
customer_reviews.text: I had the original design Bosu Ball but the rim cracked and was eventually unusable. I bought this new model but it's use is pretty much limited to using the ball side only. I like to use the Bosu for burpies and standing/squats on the bottom flat surface. The new model rim is too narrow to effectively grab for burpies and the surface is slick to stand on for squats. I sent it back and will buy another model.
customer_reviews.author: double o 7

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I just did 5k race with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg...I love this. I just did 5k race with my son and his friends, it's called The Inflatable5k, meaning you run 3 miles while having inflatable obstacles to run, jump or climb upon. I did it but I have to say it was harder then I thought to balance on a balloon! I bought this wanting to improve....was not expecting the FUN. I really love it...so easy on my joints, in fact when I use this in place of my step for aerobics DVD's , my knee pain is gone...for real...and when I run or do anything I have to wear a knee guard! Unexpected bonus!! I've told friends and they are now buying this! Really 5 star!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: great customer service - great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bosu ball but, regardless of my efforts i could not pump the thing up. Eventually my pump broke while trying. i requested and received a replacement bosu and pump within days and was able to inflate without any problems I am very happy with my bosu and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Schelly P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe balance issue from spinal nerve surgery. I just use my Bosu to stand on both sides and try not to fall. Let me tell you, 5 minutes on each side and my legs are trembling. Every muscle in your legs and core have to engage to keep you steady. Lately I have been adding a few squats. The amount of result vs time expended is great. On top of all else, it feels right...like you are doing exercise which your body understand and agrees with.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Butwin

customer_reviews.title: Products not included. Support not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: "INCLUDED: BOSU Balance Trainer, Owner's manual, and hand pump" .... not in my order. Mine just came with a deflated bosu ball and a note that said "sometimes we forget to include parts in your order".... Update: contacted support. they said they would send a pump... that was 11 days ago. still nothing
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great for working the abs --- great for the lower ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for working the abs --- great for the lower abs below the navel too doing negative-grade crunches and/or situps. Best to be naked using it, as the bare flesh adheres to the surface making it feasible for side and angled crunches, even with eyes closed while textiles don't.. Great to toughen up the gut for taking hard gut punches hard enough to knock a guy across the room..
customer_reviews.author: Spruceman

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options for use
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist says she's had one for years & years, and it's used everyday, so the durability of the thing is what sold me. I'm about 220lbs, and I've had no problem with deflation or breakage so far. There are lots of add-ons to help you choose exercises, a poster, and DVDs that go into details. I've also used it for...intimate... encounters & it's quite helpful for propping & lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Lupin Love

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer, and BOSU HAS AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE  !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of versatile equipment. Everybody should work on their balance in order to avoid falls. Unfortunately mine leaks. At first I figured that it was like a bicycle tire, and as such I would have to live with frequent re-inflations. But over time it got worse. Today I tried to return my 3 month old BOSU and learned that the return window was only one month. I called BOSU, and the rep almost immediately offered to send me a new one. He said that the leaks are normally on the edge where the sides meet the bottom; and that patches don't stick very well in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive all that was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I only received the actual BOSU and not the DVDs, pump, or manual. When I tried to get help, all contact information is invalid and my only choice is to return the product. Amazon is failing in it's product guarantee and - more importantly - customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my BOSU!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bosu!!!! I have back problems and the exercises are endless! I crunch in comfort!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleTC

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ALL PARTS WHEN BOX OPENED!
customer_reviews.text: Received trainer and opened on Christmas Day. Missing all parts except trainer itself. There was no plug to keep the air in, missing instructional DVDs, missing owners manual and missing pump. Unuseable as is, A great disappointment for my granddaughter who the gift was for. I contacted the company and they provided the replacement parts with a short delay. All parts were in one sealed bag; so, hard to understand how it wasn’t included to begin with! That said, my grand daughter thoroughly enjoys this device So, I am upgrading my review from one star to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Can't really recommend it But...
customer_reviews.text: High end selling for low end video. If you love jazzersize then you'll love this overpriced price of plastic. Like the 80's all over again. Yet...here I am queuing abs up. Better than nothin.(note the 4:3 ratio) Update... dont really uses it much. Wife pulled it out to do some random stretches. Bumped it up a star for durability and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Pudknocker71

customer_reviews.title: Losing air after only 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This started off great. I followed instructions in filling and with minimal use, I've noticed that the ball has lost at least 3-4 inches of air and is no longer bouncy. I thought it may have been a slow leak due to the connector not being seated tightly, so I refilled and made sure everything was good, and a few days later, air was gone again.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: ... fitness trainer so I know that this product is good and that its great for core and balancing
customer_reviews.text: I am a personal fitness trainer so I know that this product is good and that its great for core and balancing. I ordered this product, and while putting air in it the blue part separated from the black frame. I tried to re-enter the air but unfortunately had no success due to the fact that the product was defected from the beginning. I have no way of contacting the distributor to either get a refund or have them re-send me another Balance Trainer. Disappointed customer and wasted time & money.
customer_reviews.author: Preston L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing - I use one with my trainer ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing - I use one with my trainer at work, and I decided to get one so that I could just do some simple workouts at home, with winter storms keeping me in at times. I find myself using it all the time. The only con is that when I first got the pump, IT BROKE UPON ASSEMBLY. I had to do some makeshift pump/duct tape contraption to make it work, but I'm hoping that I can make do until then!
customer_reviews.author: dsj0102

customer_reviews.title: Family fun exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Bosu ball. I am an Occupational Therapist working with kids with special needs . I also have a facility dog who goes to work with me. I have the dog using the exercise equipment alongside the kids and it highly motivates them. She loves the Bosu also and often nudges me and walks over to the ball so she can "work out". We have family fun together. The quality is great and it was easy to inflate. It stands up to me exercising on it and to dog nails being on it and doesn't pop or leak air.
customer_reviews.author: bigdogutah

customer_reviews.title: Multi functional and durable. SOLD!
customer_reviews.text: Best home workout equipment you’ll ever buy. Works core, obliques, thighs, calves/ankles, shoulders, even your butt. It’s the all in one machine. Comes with work DVD and poster to help with stretches. Very easy to inflate and durable. My 55+ lb dogs have tried to play with it and it has withstood the bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen G

customer_reviews.title: Great balance ball
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after looking through many reviews of similar products, and even though this one is a bit more expensive, it shows in the quality of the product. The platform is nice and wide and the ball is very strong. I weigh 220, and it holds me very well. I haven't checked out the DVD that came with it, but the ball itself is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original. It is not as tall when inflated, the material is not as soft, it does not have as much give. As a result, it is not as stable and just doesn’t feel right. I use my trainer’s Bosu, loved it so purchased this to use at home. Not even close to the same.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Seemed easy enough. Tried again at home but it wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and tried to inflate the Bosu ball, that was a fail. Went to the gym to see how their Bosu balls worked. Seemed easy enough. Tried again at home but it wouldn't hold the air, took the black rim off and it had a rip.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: mixed review: bad, bad, good experience
customer_reviews.text: My feedback about the product and services are positive and negative. Negative product review: The product arrived with dark transfer marks on the ball and indentations. Negative service review: Can not reach the company. Positive product review: I have used a product like this with great results. Aside from the damage to the rubbery ball portion, the rest of the item seems sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Addition To Workout Routine
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first...but when I was looking for an addition to my workout routine that didn't have to involve weights...I would highly recommend investing in a BOSU. I am in good shape...but the full body workout is ideal to take you to the next level. Fun also. Even convinced my teenage daughter to give it a try...now she is hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Serafino

customer_reviews.title: Love my BOSU ball!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a BOSU ball when undergoing physical therapy, as I've had numerous foot, ankle and knee injuries. Each time, my physical therapist uses the BOSU ball as part of my therapy. Moving more into a health and fitness journey in my life, I know the BOSU ball can also be used for exercise. I decided to purchase my own and use it at home! Ironically, I'm back in PT and using my BOSU ball once again for a foot injury! As I work on my balance, I will move more into using it for fitness. Either way, I love my BOSU ball and would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Conimarie

customer_reviews.title: Must have love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it does come with a pump it's the black thing. And it quickly filled up with air. It's awsome for the workouts. My daughter started jumping on it and loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plug
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Bosu in time to work off my Christmas pounds. Alas, no plug to be found and it will not inflate. I tried contacting the manufacturer via Amazon but their info is not valid. Any advice from anyone on here? I found the Bosu website and reached out to them there but they only accept emails. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: ElCuervoncito

customer_reviews.title: Fun and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! Wanted a balance board for under my standing desk. Went for the Bosu because it is so much more. You can plank with this, squat with it, get your cardio or use it for holds or use it to stretch. Their website has TONS of information and videos and tips and even a blog. Easy to inflate- if you can’t hear it inflating, adjust the Bosu so it’s at an angle to get it started. Have a ruler handy! And then have fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL ITEM FOR RELEARNING MY BALANCE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this BOSU product! I recently was diagnosed with CRPS (a rare neurological disorder) and as such have a difficult time with balance. This ball has gotten me back in the game...my Physical Therapist had me use it and I couldn't get enough time on it, so I ordered one myself. Now I can do it any time and keep my balance "learned". It stores easily as well and I can do so much with it other than balance! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about my BOSU!
customer_reviews.text: It was super to easy to inflate and I thought it was going to be difficult. I love having it for exercising and physical therapy. I got a free workout download from BOSU as well as a wall chart that shows many exercises. There are many online videos on other platforms for increased exercise variability. I think BOSU is a valuable addition to my exercise equipment and routine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Updated eviw
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I got my DVD's (Had to download them using the code on he paper that comes with the Ball. IT WAS super easy to download. I able to choose from 6 DVD's. SInce you can only play at once,I think that's a good deal. The ball is solid, and the base definitely solid. I do feel like I'll have to add air, but hey if I weighed 150 lbs I wouldn't need to use itright? so adding air no biggie. Get this you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Useful. Fun.
customer_reviews.text: I am a survivor of brain and spine surgery. I’ve started to have issues with my lower back, so I started working with an online personal trainer. The Bosu was recommended to me, and wow! I had no idea it was so versatile. I have used it in PT in the past, but only to help build balance standing on the flat side. We’ve only recently began incorporating it into my regular routine and I’m loving how I can use this simple tool to strengthen and retrain my body. Plus, it’s fun! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: My son is rehabbing his second ACL tear on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is rehabbing his second ACL tear on the same leg 13 months apart. The Bosu ball has really helped his leg strength and balance!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come as described. It did not include the pump or a plug. My husband could have inflated it but that would have been a waste without the plug. Also it did not have any dvd's or workout information at all. I am returning. I was told the blue Bosu ball has the necessary equipment included. Be Aware!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my BOSU!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Bosu purchase. I had to give away the first during a major move, so I couldn't wait to replace it. It comes with a basic hand pump. At first it feels like you're not making progress, but keep at it. It also pushes air back at you when inflating until you get it past a certain point, then it inflates easily and much faster. I am 5'10" and built on the "Amazon" side, so I prefer mine at the max 10" inflation. I love that I can do HUNDREDS of exercise variations with this simple equipment. I store it under my bed in between workouts. If you like variation in your workouts, this is an essential!
customer_reviews.author: Tarazona

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Just got my bosu ball to workout at home since the gym is closed. I used one of these at the gym but with only a few limited exercises. Love having this at home to work out on because there is some much I can do on it to work core, increase stamina and for stretching. Definitely helps with my balance which is getting more important as I age. Very easy to inflate! A good buy for those of us who like to switch up exercise.
customer_reviews.author: amy king

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, A Bit Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have used BOSU balls for years and find them useful for stability exercises and core strengthening. I decided to buy one for my new home gym after COVID-19 closed my gym and it's getting a lot of use. It is well made and looks like it will last a lifetime, but only time will tell. I spent over $100 for mine, a bit pricey in my opinion, but $60 to $75 would have been a better price point.
customer_reviews.author: CombatCritic

customer_reviews.title: Happy to finally own one!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these since the first time I used in physical therapy for my knees. That was many years ago and used it again when I broke my hip. Love the versatility of it. Excited I was able to get at a good price. Delivered faster than expected. Super easy to pump up and get ready to use. Excellent at helping with my balance training, hip stability, and core exercise.
customer_reviews.author: totoks

customer_reviews.title: Fun for exercising at home
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly what was pictured (blue Bosu trainer, black hand pump, 6 DVD's, poster with different poses, and manual). I love this item, I tried it out at a gym before and decided to purchase one for home after I chose not to renew my gym membership. It's fun to use, inflates quickly with the hand pump and sturdy (so far). My only complaint is that it is a magnet for lint and hair so I have to wipe it down before and after each use. Otherwise, this is a fun addition to working out at home.
customer_reviews.author: Danana

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Within a week the air plug fell out and hardly stayed inflated. The plug popped out and now is lost. The support website and phone number listed is out of order and bad website. Help! I need to replace the plug
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great Contraption!
customer_reviews.text: I used this while I was in physical therapy for peroneal tendonitis and I found it very effective at working on my hip flexors and leg muscles, as well as balancing exercises to strengthen my ankles. Was using an air pad at home and found myself missing the equipment that I used when I was going to PT. It inflated easily and it's easy to adjust the firmness level. Same exact dome I was using at the pro's office.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tischler

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product. versatile to address many strength and balance ...
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product. versatile to address many strength and balance challenges. i am recovering from foot injury and this not only is part of my long term recovery, but also now part of my lifelong health workouts, because it has helped my overall health tremendously! can't recommend enough- are there more stars for this???
customer_reviews.author: drivethecar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is then equivalent of the one my gym uses. It seems sturdy and stable. It seems to stay inflated just great. I also loved the cds that came with it. It gave various suggestions for a workout.
customer_reviews.author: baby e's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Opt for the premium version if you can.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for exercising. Unfortunately you'll spend just as much time keeping it inflated as you will using it. I have to pull the pin out and inflate it back up every 2-3 days. I wish I had sprung for the more expensive version just to avoid the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer beads

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in however the box came sliced open, this product came with no pin to keep the product inflated or pump to inflate the ball to begin with. I tried to access their website and call but both website and phone number listed are “not available” and the phone number doesn’t exist - I got a Verizon message instead. I’m not sure if this is an Amazon issue or a Bosu issue, either way I’m not impressed and recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Goudreau

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with all components
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this as many reviewers stated they did not receive everything with it. However, I had no issues. Great ball! The whole family loves it, including the toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: This exercise item would be great if it didn't lose air constantly. And it's difficult to refill. I don't know if it is leaking air around the seam or where it is filled underneath. I wish I had sent it back much earlier for a replacement to see if the same thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: eljefeford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite exercise equipment! You can use it for cardio, yoga, pilates, strength training...it's so versatile. The workout DVD's that are included are great. Each workout is broken down into different segments, so you can choose to complete the entire workout or limit to a segment or two. This has been great for getting back into working out. I highly recommend the BOSU!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: emailed the seller and they immediately responded by sending me a plug. I did not realize it was supposed to come with a pump (mine was missing that as well) but I’m sure they would have sent me one of those as well. Awesome customer service. Original review: Looks great but missing the white plug and instructions. Maybe it’s used?
customer_reviews.author: cflam

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be warned don’t order now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be warned! Taking advantage of inability to send back during Covid 19!!Ordered mine from Hedstrom Fitness through Amazon LLC and it came looking used with no wrapping -no instructions -no pump and no plug underneath even if I use my own pump. Sending crap to fulfill then order unbelievable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARY BORG

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to treat myself to home gym equipment this Christmas. This is exactly as described and is so much more firm and sturdy than the beat up ones at my work gym. I am really excited to use this at home and not have to drive anywhere :) Best ab workout ever on these Bosus!
customer_reviews.author: WhatsInAName?

customer_reviews.title: First impression: VERY CHEESY QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: First impression, after FINALLY getting the thing to inflate with the incredibly cheesy pump that comes with it, is that I am very disappointed in the quality. I hope the actual product is not as low quality as the pump and process of inflating it seems. The cheap plastic hoses pop off numerous times, very poor plug design, no valves. I give this pump, at most, two or three inflations before it fails completely. Where did they even find such a low quality pump? Must of had them special made. VERY disappointed considering high price. May even send it back. Very bad first impression.
customer_reviews.author: LyleB

customer_reviews.title: Think Pink
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Core trainer. I've been using exercise balls for years. But they always were so unstable. This is stable it works great. I love them. There's a thing about Bosu Trainers. You can never find a deal. Price is always about the same. A little pricey but work it. I did buy a blue one too. This one always reminds me off breast cancer awareness and how the fight for cancer should always be in our hearts and minds.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy

customer_reviews.title: Loved the workout but it had a hole
customer_reviews.text: I love working out on Bosu. But unfortunately the air was leaking out constantly. I found a video on youtube and took it apart to see if I can fix it. There was a little hole on the part where it is clamped by the black base. I want to buy a pro Bosu balance but I don't want to have the same defect. This is the only reason why I am still discouraged from buying it.
customer_reviews.author: RegularCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: The first BOSU Ball I ordered deflated overnight. It was promptly returned and a new one arrived. After regular use over the past 3 months I have to inflate it about once every 2 weeks. Disappointing that the plug won't hold this otherwise quality product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite prop great for balance and core
customer_reviews.text: Since we have to stay at home, I missed my gym workout and the bosu ball is what I use to train so now I got it and started using it as I miss my balance practice and core work. I do pushups, stand on the bosu ball with the flat part on top and use weights to strengthen my core. It's a great workout
customer_reviews.author: K. Wong

customer_reviews.title: It’s a real stinker to inflate by following the directions!
customer_reviews.text: Directions say to set it on the back to inflate. I had a very strong man trying to do that until he figured out to hold it up on its side to inflate. Even then you get an extremely intense upper body workout trying to inflate this thing. Once it’s inflated, it’s great it’s versatile and it’s everything you need for core and balance workout.
customer_reviews.author: kitty frau

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving a five star review for fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: The pump was different. Could not find a plug to plug it after inflation. Wasn't sure if it needed a plug or it had a valve and no plug. I contacted customer service last night. There were two email addresses, I sent my email two both addresses. This morning I had responses from both parties. I'm giving a five star review for fantastic customer service. Oh and by the way I found the white plug, it must have been with the DVD. If you don't find an update to this review I'll stand by my five star rating. If there is a problem I am sure customer service will take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: william moyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and great sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I was pleasantly surprised that it was larger than I thought it was going to be a much sturdier like the one that I use at physical therapy. This is very helpful to me in my recovery for ACL knee repair. It was super easy to set up and was ready to go in just a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Hokkaido

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs a BOSU Ball!
customer_reviews.text: David Weck should receive the Medal of Freedom. The BOSU Ball is great for improving your balance and making a regular weight training workout more challenging. It may be a little intimidating at first; but don't give up. I've used the BOSU Ball in the gym and decided to buy one for home training. GET ONE . . . you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Deitrick

customer_reviews.title: I am better at balancing than before I used my Bosu Ball :)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my bosu ball. Since COVID I have not been able to go to a gym and thank god I ordered this one because it is keeping me fit. I do various exercises on it and my balance has gotten a lot better. It doesn't take up much space, especially since you can stand it up or if you have a high enough bed, can fit right under or inside your closet without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional gym quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great for in-home exercising. As a senior I got it to improve my sense of balance. It is exactly like the ones I’ve used at the gym
customer_reviews.author: doryphoros

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool For Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bosu Balance Trainers are not just good for people, they're great for dogs as well. Great Danes often have a huge growth spurt at around six months of age. The Bosu Balance Trainer helps to develop the muscles in their shoulders and chest as they mature. It improves the dog's confirmation, agility, and strength.
customer_reviews.author: GymB

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: At first I put too much air in it and had to take some out. Once I measured it like the directions stated it was perfect. Very easy to work the pump my granddaughter even helped me since she wanted to try it. So many YouTube videos to follow along routines From beginning to very challenging. This fits in no matter what your fitness level is
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Best exercise equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend. With the gyms being closed, she needed some exercise equipment. She used a bosu at the gym, and was really happy that I bought this one for her. She has had no issues with it. The ball stays inflated and is durable. She is able to do several exercises using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my bosu! It’s so versatile using with the ball up or upside down there’s so many different exercises I can incorporate it into. My kids love to play with it and balance on it as well. I’m glad I spent the money in the original product and not a knock off. I have not had to reinflate in and I have had it for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: nathan fleischer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: This product is SO versatile! I love using it for bouncy HIIT workouts and for really getting a killer ab workout! The creativity is endless and the workouts are always fun and effective! The fun colors I chose are just a bonus! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Zuloaga

customer_reviews.title: Problem with inflating.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a sturdy well built balancer, but I found it very difficult to try to inflate. The low quality hand pump included with this product broke on the very 1st pump. I used an electric pump, and that inflated it, but would not take it to the full 10" it is supposed to Inflate at its maximum.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and it is easy to use. I like that this allows me to do some at home workouts but doesn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Just like being at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these when I go to the gym, but sometimes I have time constraints and can’t make it to the gym so I bought one to have at home. It’s awesome and comes with it’s own inflator. Super easy to inflate. Love having one at home.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Very easy to inflate with the easy-to-use and efficient included air pump. Not sure why others might have had problems doing it. The instructions are in the manual. Plenty of exercise programs included on DVD. Very attractive color is more sky blue than dark blue.
customer_reviews.author: L. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but ball separated from base
customer_reviews.text: We purchased and used one BOSU ball and were very happy with it. We gave it to our granddaughter to use and bought a second one. We inflated the second one to the level specified and used it a few times. Soon the ball separated from the base. It looks like we should be able to fix it and inflate it less than the amount specified. If we can't fix it, we will call for a replacement. So we are happy with the product, but not at all happy that the blue ball separated from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

product_meta.title: Bosu Balance Trainer, 65cm "The Original"
product_meta.description: The BOSU Balance Trainer gives you a fast, fun workout that fits into the busiest lifestyle. It’s designed to provide cardio, muscular strength, flexibility and endurance training with just one device. And while the BOSU is an easy-to-use piece of exercise equipment, it’s impossible to master and continues to challenge as strength and endurance improves. BOSU is the original balance trainer introduced 20 years ago and is made in the US. Since it’s introduction in 1999, BOSU is still the balance trainer of choice by fitness trainers, physical therapists, fitness clubs and professional sports teams. They trust the BOSU brand and know that it’s made with quality materials and superior workmanship. The BOSU Balance Trainer is tested to last 10 times longer than the leading generic balance trainer. And, if there is problem with the BOSU, our US-based customer support team is happy to help resolve issues. To ensure you get the original BOSU look for the BOSU logo on every BOSU Balance Trainer.
feature_bullets: PROVEN: BOSU Balance Trainer provides cardio, muscular strength, flexibility and endurance training in unique, challenging and highly effective workouts. Downloadable workouts are developed by industry professionals to improve overall fitness and health.
HIGHEST QUALITY: This is "The Original" Balance Trainer. Proudly Made in the USA. If you have any issues with your product please contact us directly at help@bosu.com
BUILT TO LAST: The BOSU Balance Trainer has been tested to last 10x the leading generic balance trainer. Maximum User Weight: 300 lbs.
INCLUDED: BOSU Balance Trainer, Owner's manual, and hand pump
IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH: Challenging and fun, the BOSU Balance Trainer gives a whole new meaning to "moving with control" as you work out on an unstable, dynamic surface
Note: 2-pack DVD set of workouts is downloadable only. Actual DVD's are not included.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
